types.name: ID
types.description: The `ID` scalar type represents a unique identifier, often used to refetch an object or as key for a cache. The ID type appears in a JSON response as a String; however, it is not intended to be human-readable. When expected as an input type, any string (such as `"4"`) or integer (such as `4`) input value will be accepted as an ID.

types.name: Boolean
types.description: The `Boolean` scalar type represents `true` or `false`.

types.name: Int
types.description: The `Int` scalar type represents non-fractional signed whole numeric values. Int can represent values between -(2^31) and 2^31 - 1.

types.name: String
types.description: The `String` scalar type represents textual data, represented as UTF-8 character sequences. The String type is most often used by GraphQL to represent free-form human-readable text.

types.name: BlogPostIdType
types.description: The Type of Identifier used to fetch a single resource. Default is ID.

enumValues.name: DATABASE_ID
enumValues.description: Identify a resource by the Database ID.

enumValues.name: ID
enumValues.description: Identify a resource by the (hashed) Global ID.

enumValues.name: URI
enumValues.description: Identify a resource by the URI.

enumValues.name: SLUG
enumValues.description: Identify a resource by the slug. Available to non-hierarchcial Types where the slug is a unique identifier.

fields.name: guid

fields.name: lastEditedBy
fields.description: The user that most recently edited the node

fields.name: link
fields.description: The permalink of the post

fields.name: modified
fields.description: The local modified time for a post. If a post was recently updated the modified field will change to match the corresponding time.

fields.name: modifiedGmt
fields.description: The GMT modified time for a post. If a post was recently updated the modified field will change to match the corresponding time in GMT.

fields.name: previewRevisionDatabaseId

fields.name: previewRevisionId
fields.description: Whether the object is a node in the preview state

fields.name: deleteWithUser
fields.description: Whether content of this type should be deleted when the author of it is deleted from the system.

fields.description: Description of the content type.

fields.name: excludeFromSearch
fields.description: Whether to exclude nodes of this content type from front end search results.

fields.name: graphqlPluralName
fields.description: The plural name of the content type within the GraphQL Schema.

fields.name: graphqlSingleName
fields.description: The singular name of the content type within the GraphQL Schema.

fields.name: hasArchive
fields.description: Whether this content type should have archives. Content archives are generated by type and by date.

fields.name: hierarchical
fields.description: Whether the content type is hierarchical, for example pages.

fields.name: id
fields.description: The globally unique identifier of the post-type object.

fields.name: isFrontPage
fields.description: Whether this page is set to the static front page.

fields.name: isPostsPage
fields.description: Whether this page is set to the blog posts page.

fields.name: isRestricted
fields.description: Whether the object is restricted from the current viewer

fields.name: label
fields.description: Display name of the content type.

fields.name: labels
fields.description: Details about the content type labels.

fields.name: menuIcon
fields.description: The name of the icon file to display as a menu icon.

fields.name: menuPosition
fields.description: The position of this post type in the menu. Only applies if show_in_menu is true.

fields.name: name
fields.description: The internal name of the post type. This should not be used for display purposes.

fields.name: public
fields.description: Whether a content type is intended for use publicly either via the admin interface or by front-end users. While the default settings of exclude_from_search, publicly_queryable, show_ui, and show_in_nav_menus are inherited from public, each does not rely on this relationship and controls a very specific intention.

fields.name: publiclyQueryable
fields.description: Whether queries can be performed on the front end for the content type as part of parse_request().

fields.name: restBase
fields.description: Name of content type to display in REST API "wp/v2" namespace.

fields.name: restControllerClass
fields.description: The REST Controller class assigned to handling this content type.

fields.name: showInAdminBar
fields.description: Makes this content type available via the admin bar.

fields.name: showInGraphql
fields.description: Whether to add the content type to the GraphQL Schema.

fields.name: showInMenu
fields.description: Where to show the content type in the admin menu. To work, $show_ui must be true. If true, the post type is shown in its own top level menu. If false, no menu is shown. If a string of an existing top level menu (eg. "tools.php" or "edit.php?post_type=page"), the post type will be placed as a sub-menu of that.

fields.name: showInNavMenus
fields.description: Makes this content type available for selection in navigation menus.

fields.name: showInRest
fields.description: Whether the content type is associated with a route under the the REST API "wp/v2" namespace.

fields.name: showUi
fields.description: Whether to generate and allow a UI for managing this content type in the admin.

fields.description: The unique resource identifier path

types.name: ContentTypeToContentNodeConnectionWhereArgs
types.description: Arguments for filtering the ContentTypeToContentNodeConnection connection

inputFields.name: dateQuery
inputFields.description: Filter the connection based on dates

inputFields.name: hasPassword
inputFields.description: True for objects with passwords; False for objects without passwords; null for all objects with or without passwords

inputFields.name: id
inputFields.description: Specific ID of the object

inputFields.name: in
inputFields.description: Array of IDs for the objects to retrieve

inputFields.name: mimeType
inputFields.description: Get objects with a specific mimeType property

inputFields.name: name
inputFields.description: Slug / post_name of the object

inputFields.name: nameIn
inputFields.description: Specify objects to retrieve. Use slugs

inputFields.name: notIn
inputFields.description: Specify IDs NOT to retrieve. If this is used in the same query as "in", it will be ignored

inputFields.name: orderby
inputFields.description: What paramater to use to order the objects by.

inputFields.name: parent
inputFields.description: Use ID to return only children. Use 0 to return only top-level items

inputFields.name: parentIn
inputFields.description: Specify objects whose parent is in an array

inputFields.name: parentNotIn
inputFields.description: Specify posts whose parent is not in an array

inputFields.name: password
inputFields.description: Show posts with a specific password.

inputFields.name: search
inputFields.description: Show Posts based on a keyword search

inputFields.name: title
inputFields.description: Title of the object

types.name: DateQueryInput
types.description: Filter the connection based on input

inputFields.name: after
inputFields.description: Nodes should be returned after this date

inputFields.name: before
inputFields.description: Nodes should be returned before this date

inputFields.name: column
inputFields.description: Column to query against

inputFields.name: compare
inputFields.description: For after/before, whether exact value should be matched or not

inputFields.name: day
inputFields.description: Day of the month (from 1 to 31)

inputFields.name: hour
inputFields.description: Hour (from 0 to 23)

inputFields.name: inclusive
inputFields.description: For after/before, whether exact value should be matched or not

inputFields.name: minute
inputFields.description: Minute (from 0 to 59)

inputFields.name: month
inputFields.description: Month number (from 1 to 12)

inputFields.name: relation
inputFields.description: OR or AND, how the sub-arrays should be compared

inputFields.name: second
inputFields.description: Second (0 to 59)

inputFields.name: week
inputFields.description: Week of the year (from 0 to 53)

inputFields.name: year
inputFields.description: 4 digit year (e.g. 2017)

types.name: DatabaseIdentifier
types.description: Object that can be identified with a Database ID

fields.name: databaseId
fields.description: The unique identifier stored in the database

types.name: AvatarRatingEnum
types.description: What rating to display avatars up to. Accepts 'G', 'PG', 'R', 'X', and are judged in that order. Default is the value of the 'avatar_rating' option

types.name: Avatar
types.description: Avatars are profile images for users. WordPress by default uses the Gravatar service to host and fetch avatars from.

fields.name: default
fields.description: URL for the default image or a default type. Accepts '404' (return a 404 instead of a default image), 'retro' (8bit), 'monsterid' (monster), 'wavatar' (cartoon face), 'indenticon' (the 'quilt'), 'mystery', 'mm', or 'mysteryman' (The Oyster Man), 'blank' (transparent GIF), or 'gravatar_default' (the Gravatar logo).

fields.name: extraAttr
fields.description: HTML attributes to insert in the IMG element. Is not sanitized.

fields.name: forceDefault
fields.description: Whether to always show the default image, never the Gravatar.

fields.name: foundAvatar
fields.description: Whether the avatar was successfully found.

fields.name: height
fields.description: Height of the avatar image.

fields.name: isRestricted
fields.description: Whether the object is restricted from the current viewer

fields.name: rating
fields.description: What rating to display avatars up to. Accepts 'G', 'PG', 'R', 'X', and are judged in that order.

fields.name: scheme
fields.description: Type of url scheme to use. Typically HTTP vs. HTTPS.

fields.name: size
fields.description: The size of the avatar in pixels. A value of 96 will match a 96px x 96px gravatar image.

fields.name: url
fields.description: URL for the gravatar image source.

fields.name: width
fields.description: Width of the avatar image.

types.name: PostToCategoryConnectionWhereArgs
types.description: Arguments for filtering the PostToCategoryConnection connection

inputFields.name: cacheDomain
inputFields.description: Unique cache key to be produced when this query is stored in an object cache. Default is 'core'.

inputFields.name: childOf
inputFields.description: Term ID to retrieve child terms of. If multiple taxonomies are passed, $child_of is ignored. Default 0.

inputFields.name: childless
inputFields.description: True to limit results to terms that have no children. This parameter has no effect on non-hierarchical taxonomies. Default false.

inputFields.name: descriptionLike
inputFields.description: Retrieve terms where the description is LIKE the input value. Default empty.

inputFields.name: exclude
inputFields.description: Array of term ids to exclude. If $include is non-empty, $exclude is ignored. Default empty array.

inputFields.name: excludeTree
inputFields.description: Array of term ids to exclude along with all of their descendant terms. If $include is non-empty, $exclude_tree is ignored. Default empty array.

inputFields.name: hideEmpty
inputFields.description: Whether to hide terms not assigned to any posts. Accepts true or false. Default false

inputFields.name: hierarchical
inputFields.description: Whether to include terms that have non-empty descendants (even if $hide_empty is set to true). Default true.

inputFields.name: include
inputFields.description: Array of term ids to include. Default empty array.

inputFields.name: name
inputFields.description: Array of names to return term(s) for. Default empty.

inputFields.name: nameLike
inputFields.description: Retrieve terms where the name is LIKE the input value. Default empty.

inputFields.name: objectIds
inputFields.description: Array of object IDs. Results will be limited to terms associated with these objects.

inputFields.name: orderby
inputFields.description: Field(s) to order terms by. Defaults to 'name'.

inputFields.name: padCounts
inputFields.description: Whether to pad the quantity of a term's children in the quantity of each term's "count" object variable. Default false.

inputFields.name: parent
inputFields.description: Parent term ID to retrieve direct-child terms of. Default empty.

inputFields.name: search
inputFields.description: Search criteria to match terms. Will be SQL-formatted with wildcards before and after. Default empty.

inputFields.name: slug
inputFields.description: Array of slugs to return term(s) for. Default empty.

inputFields.name: termTaxonomId
inputFields.description: Array of term taxonomy IDs, to match when querying terms.

inputFields.name: updateTermMetaCache
inputFields.description: Whether to prime meta caches for matched terms. Default true.

types.description: Arguments for filtering the CoAuthorToBulletinConnection connection

inputFields.name: author
inputFields.description: The user that's connected as the author of the object. Use the userId for the author object.

inputFields.name: authorIn
inputFields.description: Find objects connected to author(s) in the array of author's userIds

inputFields.name: authorName
inputFields.description: Find objects connected to the author by the author's nicename

inputFields.name: authorNotIn
inputFields.description: Find objects NOT connected to author(s) in the array of author's userIds

inputFields.name: dateQuery
inputFields.description: Filter the connection based on dates

inputFields.name: hasPassword
inputFields.description: True for objects with passwords; False for objects without passwords; null for all objects with or without passwords

inputFields.name: id
inputFields.description: Specific ID of the object

inputFields.name: in
inputFields.description: Array of IDs for the objects to retrieve

inputFields.name: mimeType
inputFields.description: Get objects with a specific mimeType property

inputFields.name: name
inputFields.description: Slug / post_name of the object

inputFields.name: nameIn
inputFields.description: Specify objects to retrieve. Use slugs

inputFields.name: notIn
inputFields.description: Specify IDs NOT to retrieve. If this is used in the same query as "in", it will be ignored

inputFields.name: orderby
inputFields.description: What paramater to use to order the objects by.

inputFields.name: parent
inputFields.description: Use ID to return only children. Use 0 to return only top-level items

inputFields.name: parentIn
inputFields.description: Specify objects whose parent is in an array

inputFields.name: parentNotIn
inputFields.description: Specify posts whose parent is not in an array

inputFields.name: password
inputFields.description: Show posts with a specific password.

inputFields.name: search
inputFields.description: Show Posts based on a keyword search

inputFields.name: tag
inputFields.description: Tag Slug

inputFields.name: tagId
inputFields.description: Use Tag ID

inputFields.name: tagIn
inputFields.description: Array of tag IDs, used to display objects from one tag OR another

inputFields.name: tagNotIn
inputFields.description: Array of tag IDs, used to display objects from one tag OR another

inputFields.name: tagSlugAnd
inputFields.description: Array of tag slugs, used to display objects from one tag OR another

inputFields.name: tagSlugIn
inputFields.description: Array of tag slugs, used to exclude objects in specified tags

inputFields.name: title
inputFields.description: Title of the object

types.name: ChapterToCoAuthorConnectionWhereArgs
types.description: Arguments for filtering the ChapterToCoAuthorConnection connection

inputFields.name: cacheDomain
inputFields.description: Unique cache key to be produced when this query is stored in an object cache. Default is 'core'.

inputFields.name: childOf
inputFields.description: Term ID to retrieve child terms of. If multiple taxonomies are passed, $child_of is ignored. Default 0.

inputFields.name: childless
inputFields.description: True to limit results to terms that have no children. This parameter has no effect on non-hierarchical taxonomies. Default false.

inputFields.name: descriptionLike
inputFields.description: Retrieve terms where the description is LIKE the input value. Default empty.

inputFields.name: exclude
inputFields.description: Array of term ids to exclude. If $include is non-empty, $exclude is ignored. Default empty array.

inputFields.name: excludeTree
inputFields.description: Array of term ids to exclude along with all of their descendant terms. If $include is non-empty, $exclude_tree is ignored. Default empty array.

inputFields.name: hideEmpty
inputFields.description: Whether to hide terms not assigned to any posts. Accepts true or false. Default false

inputFields.name: hierarchical
inputFields.description: Whether to include terms that have non-empty descendants (even if $hide_empty is set to true). Default true.

inputFields.name: include
inputFields.description: Array of term ids to include. Default empty array.

inputFields.name: name
inputFields.description: Array of names to return term(s) for. Default empty.

inputFields.name: nameLike
inputFields.description: Retrieve terms where the name is LIKE the input value. Default empty.

inputFields.name: objectIds
inputFields.description: Array of object IDs. Results will be limited to terms associated with these objects.

inputFields.name: orderby
inputFields.description: Field(s) to order terms by. Defaults to 'name'.

inputFields.name: padCounts
inputFields.description: Whether to pad the quantity of a term's children in the quantity of each term's "count" object variable. Default false.

inputFields.name: parent
inputFields.description: Parent term ID to retrieve direct-child terms of. Default empty.

inputFields.name: search
inputFields.description: Search criteria to match terms. Will be SQL-formatted with wildcards before and after. Default empty.

inputFields.name: slug
inputFields.description: Array of slugs to return term(s) for. Default empty.

inputFields.name: termTaxonomId
inputFields.description: Array of term taxonomy IDs, to match when querying terms.

inputFields.name: updateTermMetaCache
inputFields.description: Whether to prime meta caches for matched terms. Default true.

types.name: ChapterToTagConnectionWhereArgs
types.description: Arguments for filtering the ChapterToTagConnection connection

inputFields.name: cacheDomain
inputFields.description: Unique cache key to be produced when this query is stored in an object cache. Default is 'core'.

inputFields.name: childOf
inputFields.description: Term ID to retrieve child terms of. If multiple taxonomies are passed, $child_of is ignored. Default 0.

inputFields.name: childless
inputFields.description: True to limit results to terms that have no children. This parameter has no effect on non-hierarchical taxonomies. Default false.

inputFields.name: descriptionLike
inputFields.description: Retrieve terms where the description is LIKE the input value. Default empty.

inputFields.name: exclude
inputFields.description: Array of term ids to exclude. If $include is non-empty, $exclude is ignored. Default empty array.

inputFields.name: excludeTree
inputFields.description: Array of term ids to exclude along with all of their descendant terms. If $include is non-empty, $exclude_tree is ignored. Default empty array.

inputFields.name: hideEmpty
inputFields.description: Whether to hide terms not assigned to any posts. Accepts true or false. Default false

inputFields.name: hierarchical
inputFields.description: Whether to include terms that have non-empty descendants (even if $hide_empty is set to true). Default true.

inputFields.name: include
inputFields.description: Array of term ids to include. Default empty array.

inputFields.name: name
inputFields.description: Array of names to return term(s) for. Default empty.

inputFields.name: nameLike
inputFields.description: Retrieve terms where the name is LIKE the input value. Default empty.

inputFields.name: objectIds
inputFields.description: Array of object IDs. Results will be limited to terms associated with these objects.

inputFields.name: orderby
inputFields.description: Field(s) to order terms by. Defaults to 'name'.

inputFields.name: padCounts
inputFields.description: Whether to pad the quantity of a term's children in the quantity of each term's "count" object variable. Default false.

inputFields.name: parent
inputFields.description: Parent term ID to retrieve direct-child terms of. Default empty.

inputFields.name: search
inputFields.description: Search criteria to match terms. Will be SQL-formatted with wildcards before and after. Default empty.

inputFields.name: slug
inputFields.description: Array of slugs to return term(s) for. Default empty.

inputFields.name: termTaxonomId
inputFields.description: Array of term taxonomy IDs, to match when querying terms.

inputFields.name: updateTermMetaCache
inputFields.description: Whether to prime meta caches for matched terms. Default true.

types.name: CollectionToTagConnectionWhereArgs
types.description: Arguments for filtering the CollectionToTagConnection connection

inputFields.name: cacheDomain
inputFields.description: Unique cache key to be produced when this query is stored in an object cache. Default is 'core'.

inputFields.name: childOf
inputFields.description: Term ID to retrieve child terms of. If multiple taxonomies are passed, $child_of is ignored. Default 0.

inputFields.name: childless
inputFields.description: True to limit results to terms that have no children. This parameter has no effect on non-hierarchical taxonomies. Default false.

inputFields.name: descriptionLike
inputFields.description: Retrieve terms where the description is LIKE the input value. Default empty.

inputFields.name: exclude
inputFields.description: Array of term ids to exclude. If $include is non-empty, $exclude is ignored. Default empty array.

inputFields.name: excludeTree
inputFields.description: Array of term ids to exclude along with all of their descendant terms. If $include is non-empty, $exclude_tree is ignored. Default empty array.

inputFields.name: hideEmpty
inputFields.description: Whether to hide terms not assigned to any posts. Accepts true or false. Default false

inputFields.name: hierarchical
inputFields.description: Whether to include terms that have non-empty descendants (even if $hide_empty is set to true). Default true.

inputFields.name: include
inputFields.description: Array of term ids to include. Default empty array.

inputFields.name: name
inputFields.description: Array of names to return term(s) for. Default empty.

inputFields.name: nameLike
inputFields.description: Retrieve terms where the name is LIKE the input value. Default empty.

inputFields.name: objectIds
inputFields.description: Array of object IDs. Results will be limited to terms associated with these objects.

inputFields.name: orderby
inputFields.description: Field(s) to order terms by. Defaults to 'name'.

inputFields.name: padCounts
inputFields.description: Whether to pad the quantity of a term's children in the quantity of each term's "count" object variable. Default false.

inputFields.name: parent
inputFields.description: Parent term ID to retrieve direct-child terms of. Default empty.

inputFields.name: search
inputFields.description: Search criteria to match terms. Will be SQL-formatted with wildcards before and after. Default empty.

inputFields.name: slug
inputFields.description: Array of slugs to return term(s) for. Default empty.

inputFields.name: termTaxonomId
inputFields.description: Array of term taxonomy IDs, to match when querying terms.

inputFields.name: updateTermMetaCache
inputFields.description: Whether to prime meta caches for matched terms. Default true.

types.name: NugToEmailListConnectionWhereArgs
types.description: Arguments for filtering the NugToEmailListConnection connection

inputFields.name: cacheDomain
inputFields.description: Unique cache key to be produced when this query is stored in an object cache. Default is 'core'.

inputFields.name: childOf
inputFields.description: Term ID to retrieve child terms of. If multiple taxonomies are passed, $child_of is ignored. Default 0.

inputFields.name: childless
inputFields.description: True to limit results to terms that have no children. This parameter has no effect on non-hierarchical taxonomies. Default false.

inputFields.name: descriptionLike
inputFields.description: Retrieve terms where the description is LIKE the input value. Default empty.

inputFields.name: exclude
inputFields.description: Array of term ids to exclude. If $include is non-empty, $exclude is ignored. Default empty array.

inputFields.name: excludeTree
inputFields.description: Array of term ids to exclude along with all of their descendant terms. If $include is non-empty, $exclude_tree is ignored. Default empty array.

inputFields.name: hideEmpty
inputFields.description: Whether to hide terms not assigned to any posts. Accepts true or false. Default false

inputFields.name: hierarchical
inputFields.description: Whether to include terms that have non-empty descendants (even if $hide_empty is set to true). Default true.

inputFields.name: include
inputFields.description: Array of term ids to include. Default empty array.

inputFields.name: name
inputFields.description: Array of names to return term(s) for. Default empty.

inputFields.name: nameLike
inputFields.description: Retrieve terms where the name is LIKE the input value. Default empty.

inputFields.name: objectIds
inputFields.description: Array of object IDs. Results will be limited to terms associated with these objects.

inputFields.name: orderby
inputFields.description: Field(s) to order terms by. Defaults to 'name'.

inputFields.name: padCounts
inputFields.description: Whether to pad the quantity of a term's children in the quantity of each term's "count" object variable. Default false.

inputFields.name: parent
inputFields.description: Parent term ID to retrieve direct-child terms of. Default empty.

inputFields.name: search
inputFields.description: Search criteria to match terms. Will be SQL-formatted with wildcards before and after. Default empty.

inputFields.name: slug
inputFields.description: Array of slugs to return term(s) for. Default empty.

inputFields.name: termTaxonomId
inputFields.description: Array of term taxonomy IDs, to match when querying terms.

inputFields.name: updateTermMetaCache
inputFields.description: Whether to prime meta caches for matched terms. Default true.

types.name: TopicToTopicConnectionWhereArgs
types.description: Arguments for filtering the TopicToTopicConnection connection

inputFields.name: cacheDomain
inputFields.description: Unique cache key to be produced when this query is stored in an object cache. Default is 'core'.

inputFields.name: childOf
inputFields.description: Term ID to retrieve child terms of. If multiple taxonomies are passed, $child_of is ignored. Default 0.

inputFields.name: childless
inputFields.description: True to limit results to terms that have no children. This parameter has no effect on non-hierarchical taxonomies. Default false.

inputFields.name: descriptionLike
inputFields.description: Retrieve terms where the description is LIKE the input value. Default empty.

inputFields.name: exclude
inputFields.description: Array of term ids to exclude. If $include is non-empty, $exclude is ignored. Default empty array.

inputFields.name: excludeTree
inputFields.description: Array of term ids to exclude along with all of their descendant terms. If $include is non-empty, $exclude_tree is ignored. Default empty array.

inputFields.name: hideEmpty
inputFields.description: Whether to hide terms not assigned to any posts. Accepts true or false. Default false

inputFields.name: hierarchical
inputFields.description: Whether to include terms that have non-empty descendants (even if $hide_empty is set to true). Default true.

inputFields.name: include
inputFields.description: Array of term ids to include. Default empty array.

inputFields.name: name
inputFields.description: Array of names to return term(s) for. Default empty.

inputFields.name: nameLike
inputFields.description: Retrieve terms where the name is LIKE the input value. Default empty.

inputFields.name: objectIds
inputFields.description: Array of object IDs. Results will be limited to terms associated with these objects.

inputFields.name: orderby
inputFields.description: Field(s) to order terms by. Defaults to 'name'.

inputFields.name: padCounts
inputFields.description: Whether to pad the quantity of a term's children in the quantity of each term's "count" object variable. Default false.

inputFields.name: parent
inputFields.description: Parent term ID to retrieve direct-child terms of. Default empty.

inputFields.name: search
inputFields.description: Search criteria to match terms. Will be SQL-formatted with wildcards before and after. Default empty.

inputFields.name: slug
inputFields.description: Array of slugs to return term(s) for. Default empty.

inputFields.name: termTaxonomId
inputFields.description: Array of term taxonomy IDs, to match when querying terms.

inputFields.name: updateTermMetaCache
inputFields.description: Whether to prime meta caches for matched terms. Default true.

types.name: EmailToTagConnectionWhereArgs
types.description: Arguments for filtering the EmailToTagConnection connection

inputFields.name: cacheDomain
inputFields.description: Unique cache key to be produced when this query is stored in an object cache. Default is 'core'.

inputFields.name: childOf
inputFields.description: Term ID to retrieve child terms of. If multiple taxonomies are passed, $child_of is ignored. Default 0.

inputFields.name: childless
inputFields.description: True to limit results to terms that have no children. This parameter has no effect on non-hierarchical taxonomies. Default false.

inputFields.name: descriptionLike
inputFields.description: Retrieve terms where the description is LIKE the input value. Default empty.

inputFields.name: exclude
inputFields.description: Array of term ids to exclude. If $include is non-empty, $exclude is ignored. Default empty array.

inputFields.name: excludeTree
inputFields.description: Array of term ids to exclude along with all of their descendant terms. If $include is non-empty, $exclude_tree is ignored. Default empty array.

inputFields.name: hideEmpty
inputFields.description: Whether to hide terms not assigned to any posts. Accepts true or false. Default false

inputFields.name: hierarchical
inputFields.description: Whether to include terms that have non-empty descendants (even if $hide_empty is set to true). Default true.

inputFields.name: include
inputFields.description: Array of term ids to include. Default empty array.

inputFields.name: name
inputFields.description: Array of names to return term(s) for. Default empty.

inputFields.name: nameLike
inputFields.description: Retrieve terms where the name is LIKE the input value. Default empty.

inputFields.name: objectIds
inputFields.description: Array of object IDs. Results will be limited to terms associated with these objects.

inputFields.name: orderby
inputFields.description: Field(s) to order terms by. Defaults to 'name'.

inputFields.name: padCounts
inputFields.description: Whether to pad the quantity of a term's children in the quantity of each term's "count" object variable. Default false.

inputFields.name: parent
inputFields.description: Parent term ID to retrieve direct-child terms of. Default empty.

inputFields.name: search
inputFields.description: Search criteria to match terms. Will be SQL-formatted with wildcards before and after. Default empty.

inputFields.name: slug
inputFields.description: Array of slugs to return term(s) for. Default empty.

inputFields.name: termTaxonomId
inputFields.description: Array of term taxonomy IDs, to match when querying terms.

inputFields.name: updateTermMetaCache
inputFields.description: Whether to prime meta caches for matched terms. Default true.

types.name: PageToCoAuthorConnectionWhereArgs
types.description: Arguments for filtering the PageToCoAuthorConnection connection

inputFields.name: cacheDomain
inputFields.description: Unique cache key to be produced when this query is stored in an object cache. Default is 'core'.

inputFields.name: childOf
inputFields.description: Term ID to retrieve child terms of. If multiple taxonomies are passed, $child_of is ignored. Default 0.

inputFields.name: childless
inputFields.description: True to limit results to terms that have no children. This parameter has no effect on non-hierarchical taxonomies. Default false.

inputFields.name: descriptionLike
inputFields.description: Retrieve terms where the description is LIKE the input value. Default empty.

inputFields.name: exclude
inputFields.description: Array of term ids to exclude. If $include is non-empty, $exclude is ignored. Default empty array.

inputFields.name: excludeTree
inputFields.description: Array of term ids to exclude along with all of their descendant terms. If $include is non-empty, $exclude_tree is ignored. Default empty array.

inputFields.name: hideEmpty
inputFields.description: Whether to hide terms not assigned to any posts. Accepts true or false. Default false

inputFields.name: hierarchical
inputFields.description: Whether to include terms that have non-empty descendants (even if $hide_empty is set to true). Default true.

inputFields.name: include
inputFields.description: Array of term ids to include. Default empty array.

inputFields.name: name
inputFields.description: Array of names to return term(s) for. Default empty.

inputFields.name: nameLike
inputFields.description: Retrieve terms where the name is LIKE the input value. Default empty.

inputFields.name: objectIds
inputFields.description: Array of object IDs. Results will be limited to terms associated with these objects.

inputFields.name: orderby
inputFields.description: Field(s) to order terms by. Defaults to 'name'.

inputFields.name: padCounts
inputFields.description: Whether to pad the quantity of a term's children in the quantity of each term's "count" object variable. Default false.

inputFields.name: parent
inputFields.description: Parent term ID to retrieve direct-child terms of. Default empty.

inputFields.name: search
inputFields.description: Search criteria to match terms. Will be SQL-formatted with wildcards before and after. Default empty.

inputFields.name: slug
inputFields.description: Array of slugs to return term(s) for. Default empty.

inputFields.name: termTaxonomId
inputFields.description: Array of term taxonomy IDs, to match when querying terms.

inputFields.name: updateTermMetaCache
inputFields.description: Whether to prime meta caches for matched terms. Default true.

inputFields.description: Include comments from a given array of comment types.

inputFields.description: Exclude comments from a given array of comment types.

inputFields.description: Array of content object IDs to exclude affiliated comments for.

inputFields.name: includeUnapproved

inputFields.name: karma

inputFields.name: order
inputFields.description: The cardinality of the order of the connection

inputFields.name: orderby
inputFields.description: Field to order the comments by.

inputFields.name: parent

inputFields.name: parentIn

inputFields.name: parentNotIn
inputFields.description: Array of parent IDs of comments *not* to retrieve children for.

inputFields.name: search
inputFields.description: Search term(s) to retrieve matching comments for.

inputFields.name: status
inputFields.description: Comment status to limit results by.

inputFields.name: userId
inputFields.description: Include comments for a specific user ID.

inputFields.name: cacheDomain
inputFields.description: Unique cache key to be produced when this query is stored in an object cache. Default is 'core'.

inputFields.name: childOf
inputFields.description: Term ID to retrieve child terms of. If multiple taxonomies are passed, $child_of is ignored. Default 0.

inputFields.name: childless
inputFields.description: True to limit results to terms that have no children. This parameter has no effect on non-hierarchical taxonomies. Default false.

inputFields.name: descriptionLike
inputFields.description: Retrieve terms where the description is LIKE the input value. Default empty.

inputFields.name: exclude
inputFields.description: Array of term ids to exclude. If $include is non-empty, $exclude is ignored. Default empty array.

inputFields.name: excludeTree
inputFields.description: Array of term ids to exclude along with all of their descendant terms. If $include is non-empty, $exclude_tree is ignored. Default empty array.

inputFields.name: hideEmpty
inputFields.description: Whether to hide terms not assigned to any posts. Accepts true or false. Default false

inputFields.name: hierarchical
inputFields.description: Whether to include terms that have non-empty descendants (even if $hide_empty is set to true). Default true.

inputFields.name: include
inputFields.description: Array of term ids to include. Default empty array.

inputFields.name: name
inputFields.description: Array of names to return term(s) for. Default empty.

inputFields.name: nameLike
inputFields.description: Retrieve terms where the name is LIKE the input value. Default empty.

inputFields.name: objectIds
inputFields.description: Array of object IDs. Results will be limited to terms associated with these objects.

inputFields.name: orderby
inputFields.description: Field(s) to order terms by. Defaults to 'name'.

inputFields.name: padCounts
inputFields.description: Whether to pad the quantity of a term's children in the quantity of each term's "count" object variable. Default false.

inputFields.name: parent
inputFields.description: Parent term ID to retrieve direct-child terms of. Default empty.

inputFields.name: search
inputFields.description: Search criteria to match terms. Will be SQL-formatted with wildcards before and after. Default empty.

inputFields.name: slug
inputFields.description: Array of slugs to return term(s) for. Default empty.

inputFields.name: termTaxonomId
inputFields.description: Array of term taxonomy IDs, to match when querying terms.

inputFields.name: updateTermMetaCache
inputFields.description: Whether to prime meta caches for matched terms. Default true.

types.name: PostToFlagConnectionWhereArgs
types.description: Arguments for filtering the PostToFlagConnection connection

inputFields.name: cacheDomain
inputFields.description: Unique cache key to be produced when this query is stored in an object cache. Default is 'core'.

inputFields.name: childOf
inputFields.description: Term ID to retrieve child terms of. If multiple taxonomies are passed, $child_of is ignored. Default 0.

inputFields.name: childless
inputFields.description: True to limit results to terms that have no children. This parameter has no effect on non-hierarchical taxonomies. Default false.

inputFields.name: descriptionLike
inputFields.description: Retrieve terms where the description is LIKE the input value. Default empty.

inputFields.name: exclude
inputFields.description: Array of term ids to exclude. If $include is non-empty, $exclude is ignored. Default empty array.

inputFields.name: excludeTree
inputFields.description: Array of term ids to exclude along with all of their descendant terms. If $include is non-empty, $exclude_tree is ignored. Default empty array.

inputFields.name: hideEmpty
inputFields.description: Whether to hide terms not assigned to any posts. Accepts true or false. Default false

inputFields.name: hierarchical
inputFields.description: Whether to include terms that have non-empty descendants (even if $hide_empty is set to true). Default true.

inputFields.name: include
inputFields.description: Array of term ids to include. Default empty array.

inputFields.name: name
inputFields.description: Array of names to return term(s) for. Default empty.

inputFields.name: nameLike
inputFields.description: Retrieve terms where the name is LIKE the input value. Default empty.

inputFields.name: objectIds
inputFields.description: Array of object IDs. Results will be limited to terms associated with these objects.

inputFields.name: orderby
inputFields.description: Field(s) to order terms by. Defaults to 'name'.

inputFields.name: padCounts
inputFields.description: Whether to pad the quantity of a term's children in the quantity of each term's "count" object variable. Default false.

inputFields.name: parent
inputFields.description: Parent term ID to retrieve direct-child terms of. Default empty.

inputFields.name: search
inputFields.description: Search criteria to match terms. Will be SQL-formatted with wildcards before and after. Default empty.

inputFields.name: slug
inputFields.description: Array of slugs to return term(s) for. Default empty.

inputFields.name: termTaxonomId
inputFields.description: Array of term taxonomy IDs, to match when querying terms.

inputFields.name: updateTermMetaCache
inputFields.description: Whether to prime meta caches for matched terms. Default true.

inputFields.description: Whether to prime meta caches for matched terms. Default true.

types.name: PostToProjectConnectionWhereArgs
types.description: Arguments for filtering the PostToProjectConnection connection

inputFields.name: cacheDomain
inputFields.description: Unique cache key to be produced when this query is stored in an object cache. Default is 'core'.

inputFields.name: childOf
inputFields.description: Term ID to retrieve child terms of. If multiple taxonomies are passed, $child_of is ignored. Default 0.

inputFields.name: childless
inputFields.description: True to limit results to terms that have no children. This parameter has no effect on non-hierarchical taxonomies. Default false.

inputFields.name: descriptionLike
inputFields.description: Retrieve terms where the description is LIKE the input value. Default empty.

inputFields.name: exclude
inputFields.description: Array of term ids to exclude. If $include is non-empty, $exclude is ignored. Default empty array.

inputFields.name: excludeTree
inputFields.description: Array of term ids to exclude along with all of their descendant terms. If $include is non-empty, $exclude_tree is ignored. Default empty array.

inputFields.name: hideEmpty
inputFields.description: Whether to hide terms not assigned to any posts. Accepts true or false. Default false

inputFields.name: hierarchical
inputFields.description: Whether to include terms that have non-empty descendants (even if $hide_empty is set to true). Default true.

inputFields.name: include
inputFields.description: Array of term ids to include. Default empty array.

inputFields.name: name
inputFields.description: Array of names to return term(s) for. Default empty.

inputFields.name: nameLike
inputFields.description: Retrieve terms where the name is LIKE the input value. Default empty.

inputFields.name: objectIds
inputFields.description: Array of object IDs. Results will be limited to terms associated with these objects.

inputFields.name: orderby
inputFields.description: Field(s) to order terms by. Defaults to 'name'.

inputFields.name: padCounts
inputFields.description: Whether to pad the quantity of a term's children in the quantity of each term's "count" object variable. Default false.

inputFields.name: parent
inputFields.description: Parent term ID to retrieve direct-child terms of. Default empty.

inputFields.name: search
inputFields.description: Search criteria to match terms. Will be SQL-formatted with wildcards before and after. Default empty.

inputFields.name: slug
inputFields.description: Array of slugs to return term(s) for. Default empty.

inputFields.name: termTaxonomId
inputFields.description: Array of term taxonomy IDs, to match when querying terms.

inputFields.name: updateTermMetaCache
inputFields.description: Whether to prime meta caches for matched terms. Default true.

types.name: ShowToBulletinConnectionWhereArgs
types.description: Arguments for filtering the ShowToBulletinConnection connection

inputFields.name: author
inputFields.description: The user that's connected as the author of the object. Use the userId for the author object.

inputFields.name: authorIn
inputFields.description: Find objects connected to author(s) in the array of author's userIds

inputFields.name: authorName
inputFields.description: Find objects connected to the author by the author's nicename

inputFields.name: authorNotIn
inputFields.description: Find objects NOT connected to author(s) in the array of author's userIds

inputFields.name: dateQuery
inputFields.description: Filter the connection based on dates

inputFields.name: hasPassword
inputFields.description: True for objects with passwords; False for objects without passwords; null for all objects with or without passwords

inputFields.name: id
inputFields.description: Specific ID of the object

inputFields.name: in
inputFields.description: Array of IDs for the objects to retrieve

inputFields.name: mimeType
inputFields.description: Get objects with a specific mimeType property

inputFields.name: name
inputFields.description: Slug / post_name of the object

inputFields.name: nameIn
inputFields.description: Specify objects to retrieve. Use slugs

inputFields.name: notIn
inputFields.description: Specify IDs NOT to retrieve. If this is used in the same query as "in", it will be ignored

inputFields.name: orderby
inputFields.description: What paramater to use to order the objects by.

inputFields.name: parent
inputFields.description: Use ID to return only children. Use 0 to return only top-level items

inputFields.name: parentIn
inputFields.description: Specify objects whose parent is in an array

inputFields.name: parentNotIn
inputFields.description: Specify posts whose parent is not in an array

inputFields.name: password
inputFields.description: Show posts with a specific password.

inputFields.name: search
inputFields.description: Show Posts based on a keyword search

inputFields.name: tag
inputFields.description: Tag Slug

inputFields.name: tagId
inputFields.description: Use Tag ID

inputFields.name: tagIn
inputFields.description: Array of tag IDs, used to display objects from one tag OR another

inputFields.name: tagNotIn
inputFields.description: Array of tag IDs, used to display objects from one tag OR another

inputFields.name: tagSlugAnd
inputFields.description: Array of tag slugs, used to display objects from one tag OR another

inputFields.name: tagSlugIn
inputFields.description: Array of tag slugs, used to exclude objects in specified tags

inputFields.name: title
inputFields.description: Title of the object

types.name: PostToTagConnectionWhereArgs
types.description: Arguments for filtering the PostToTagConnection connection

inputFields.name: cacheDomain
inputFields.description: Unique cache key to be produced when this query is stored in an object cache. Default is 'core'.

inputFields.name: childOf
inputFields.description: Term ID to retrieve child terms of. If multiple taxonomies are passed, $child_of is ignored. Default 0.

inputFields.name: childless
inputFields.description: True to limit results to terms that have no children. This parameter has no effect on non-hierarchical taxonomies. Default false.

inputFields.name: descriptionLike
inputFields.description: Retrieve terms where the description is LIKE the input value. Default empty.

inputFields.name: exclude
inputFields.description: Array of term ids to exclude. If $include is non-empty, $exclude is ignored. Default empty array.

inputFields.name: excludeTree
inputFields.description: Array of term ids to exclude along with all of their descendant terms. If $include is non-empty, $exclude_tree is ignored. Default empty array.

inputFields.name: hideEmpty
inputFields.description: Whether to hide terms not assigned to any posts. Accepts true or false. Default false

inputFields.name: hierarchical
inputFields.description: Whether to include terms that have non-empty descendants (even if $hide_empty is set to true). Default true.

inputFields.name: include
inputFields.description: Array of term ids to include. Default empty array.

inputFields.name: name
inputFields.description: Array of names to return term(s) for. Default empty.

inputFields.name: nameLike
inputFields.description: Retrieve terms where the name is LIKE the input value. Default empty.

inputFields.name: objectIds
inputFields.description: Array of object IDs. Results will be limited to terms associated with these objects.

inputFields.name: orderby
inputFields.description: Field(s) to order terms by. Defaults to 'name'.

inputFields.name: padCounts
inputFields.description: Whether to pad the quantity of a term's children in the quantity of each term's "count" object variable. Default false.

inputFields.name: parent
inputFields.description: Parent term ID to retrieve direct-child terms of. Default empty.

inputFields.name: search
inputFields.description: Search criteria to match terms. Will be SQL-formatted with wildcards before and after. Default empty.

inputFields.name: slug
inputFields.description: Array of slugs to return term(s) for. Default empty.

inputFields.name: termTaxonomId
inputFields.description: Array of term taxonomy IDs, to match when querying terms.

inputFields.name: updateTermMetaCache
inputFields.description: Whether to prime meta caches for matched terms. Default true.

inputFields.name: author
inputFields.description: The user that's connected as the author of the object. Use the userId for the author object.

inputFields.name: authorIn
inputFields.description: Find objects connected to author(s) in the array of author's userIds

inputFields.name: authorName
inputFields.description: Find objects connected to the author by the author's nicename

inputFields.name: authorNotIn
inputFields.description: Find objects NOT connected to author(s) in the array of author's userIds

inputFields.name: dateQuery
inputFields.description: Filter the connection based on dates

inputFields.name: hasPassword
inputFields.description: True for objects with passwords; False for objects without passwords; null for all objects with or without passwords

inputFields.name: id
inputFields.description: Specific ID of the object

inputFields.name: in
inputFields.description: Array of IDs for the objects to retrieve

inputFields.name: mimeType
inputFields.description: Get objects with a specific mimeType property

inputFields.name: name
inputFields.description: Slug / post_name of the object

inputFields.name: nameIn
inputFields.description: Specify objects to retrieve. Use slugs

inputFields.name: notIn
inputFields.description: Specify IDs NOT to retrieve. If this is used in the same query as "in", it will be ignored

inputFields.name: orderby
inputFields.description: What paramater to use to order the objects by.

inputFields.name: parent
inputFields.description: Use ID to return only children. Use 0 to return only top-level items

inputFields.name: parentIn
inputFields.description: Specify objects whose parent is in an array

inputFields.name: parentNotIn
inputFields.description: Specify posts whose parent is not in an array

inputFields.name: password
inputFields.description: Show posts with a specific password.

inputFields.name: search
inputFields.description: Show Posts based on a keyword search

inputFields.name: tag
inputFields.description: Tag Slug

inputFields.name: tagId
inputFields.description: Use Tag ID

inputFields.name: tagIn
inputFields.description: Array of tag IDs, used to display objects from one tag OR another

inputFields.name: tagNotIn
inputFields.description: Array of tag IDs, used to display objects from one tag OR another

inputFields.name: tagSlugAnd
inputFields.description: Array of tag slugs, used to display objects from one tag OR another

inputFields.name: tagSlugIn
inputFields.description: Array of tag slugs, used to exclude objects in specified tags

inputFields.name: title
inputFields.description: Title of the object

inputFields.name: contentStatus
inputFields.description: Array of content object statuses to retrieve affiliated comments for. Pass 'any' to match any value.

inputFields.name: contentType
inputFields.description: Content object type or array of types to retrieve affiliated comments for. Pass 'any' to match any value.

inputFields.name: includeUnapproved
inputFields.description: Array of IDs or email addresses of users whose unapproved comments will be returned by the query regardless of $status. Default empty

inputFields.name: karma
inputFields.description: Karma score to retrieve matching comments for.

inputFields.name: order
inputFields.description: The cardinality of the order of the connection

inputFields.name: orderby
inputFields.description: Field to order the comments by.

inputFields.name: parent
inputFields.description: Parent ID of comment to retrieve children of.

inputFields.name: parentIn
inputFields.description: Array of parent IDs of comments to retrieve children for.

inputFields.name: parentNotIn
inputFields.description: Array of parent IDs of comments *not* to retrieve children for.

inputFields.name: search
inputFields.description: Search term(s) to retrieve matching comments for.

inputFields.name: status
inputFields.description: Comment status to limit results by.

inputFields.name: userId
inputFields.description: Include comments for a specific user ID.

types.name: BlogPostToTagConnectionWhereArgs
types.description: Arguments for filtering the BlogPostToTagConnection connection

inputFields.name: cacheDomain
inputFields.description: Unique cache key to be produced when this query is stored in an object cache. Default is 'core'.

inputFields.name: childOf
inputFields.description: Term ID to retrieve child terms of. If multiple taxonomies are passed, $child_of is ignored. Default 0.

inputFields.name: childless
inputFields.description: True to limit results to terms that have no children. This parameter has no effect on non-hierarchical taxonomies. Default false.

inputFields.name: descriptionLike
inputFields.description: Retrieve terms where the description is LIKE the input value. Default empty.

inputFields.name: exclude
inputFields.description: Array of term ids to exclude. If $include is non-empty, $exclude is ignored. Default empty array.

inputFields.name: excludeTree
inputFields.description: Array of term ids to exclude along with all of their descendant terms. If $include is non-empty, $exclude_tree is ignored. Default empty array.

inputFields.name: hideEmpty
inputFields.description: Whether to hide terms not assigned to any posts. Accepts true or false. Default false

inputFields.name: hierarchical
inputFields.description: Whether to include terms that have non-empty descendants (even if $hide_empty is set to true). Default true.

inputFields.name: include
inputFields.description: Array of term ids to include. Default empty array.

inputFields.name: name
inputFields.description: Array of names to return term(s) for. Default empty.

inputFields.name: nameLike
inputFields.description: Retrieve terms where the name is LIKE the input value. Default empty.

inputFields.name: objectIds
inputFields.description: Array of object IDs. Results will be limited to terms associated with these objects.

inputFields.name: orderby
inputFields.description: Field(s) to order terms by. Defaults to 'name'.

inputFields.name: padCounts
inputFields.description: Whether to pad the quantity of a term's children in the quantity of each term's "count" object variable. Default false.

inputFields.name: parent
inputFields.description: Parent term ID to retrieve direct-child terms of. Default empty.

inputFields.name: search
inputFields.description: Search criteria to match terms. Will be SQL-formatted with wildcards before and after. Default empty.

inputFields.name: slug
inputFields.description: Array of slugs to return term(s) for. Default empty.

inputFields.name: termTaxonomId
inputFields.description: Array of term taxonomy IDs, to match when querying terms.

inputFields.name: updateTermMetaCache
inputFields.description: Whether to prime meta caches for matched terms. Default true.

inputFields.description: Unique cache key to be produced when this query is stored in an object cache. Default is 'core'.

inputFields.name: childOf
inputFields.description: Term ID to retrieve child terms of. If multiple taxonomies are passed, $child_of is ignored. Default 0.

inputFields.name: childless
inputFields.description: True to limit results to terms that have no children. This parameter has no effect on non-hierarchical taxonomies. Default false.

inputFields.name: descriptionLike
inputFields.description: Retrieve terms where the description is LIKE the input value. Default empty.

inputFields.name: exclude
inputFields.description: Array of term ids to exclude. If $include is non-empty, $exclude is ignored. Default empty array.

inputFields.name: excludeTree
inputFields.description: Array of term ids to exclude along with all of their descendant terms. If $include is non-empty, $exclude_tree is ignored. Default empty array.

inputFields.name: hideEmpty
inputFields.description: Whether to hide terms not assigned to any posts. Accepts true or false. Default false

inputFields.name: hierarchical
inputFields.description: Whether to include terms that have non-empty descendants (even if $hide_empty is set to true). Default true.

inputFields.name: include
inputFields.description: Array of term ids to include. Default empty array.

inputFields.name: name
inputFields.description: Array of names to return term(s) for. Default empty.

inputFields.name: nameLike
inputFields.description: Retrieve terms where the name is LIKE the input value. Default empty.

inputFields.name: objectIds
inputFields.description: Array of object IDs. Results will be limited to terms associated with these objects.

inputFields.name: orderby
inputFields.description: Field(s) to order terms by. Defaults to 'name'.

inputFields.name: padCounts
inputFields.description: Whether to pad the quantity of a term's children in the quantity of each term's "count" object variable. Default false.

inputFields.name: parent
inputFields.description: Parent term ID to retrieve direct-child terms of. Default empty.

inputFields.name: search
inputFields.description: Search criteria to match terms. Will be SQL-formatted with wildcards before and after. Default empty.

inputFields.name: slug
inputFields.description: Array of slugs to return term(s) for. Default empty.

inputFields.name: termTaxonomId
inputFields.description: Array of term taxonomy IDs, to match when querying terms.

inputFields.name: updateTermMetaCache
inputFields.description: Whether to prime meta caches for matched terms. Default true.

types.name: RootQueryToUserConnectionWhereArgs
types.description: Arguments for filtering the RootQueryToUserConnection connection

inputFields.name: exclude
inputFields.description: Array of userIds to exclude.

inputFields.name: hasPublishedPosts
inputFields.description: Pass an array of post types to filter results to users who have published posts in those post types.

inputFields.name: include
inputFields.description: Array of userIds to include.

inputFields.name: login
inputFields.description: The user login.

inputFields.name: loginIn
inputFields.description: An array of logins to include. Users matching one of these logins will be included in results.

inputFields.name: loginNotIn
inputFields.description: An array of logins to exclude. Users matching one of these logins will not be included in results.

inputFields.name: nicename
inputFields.description: The user nicename.

inputFields.name: nicenameIn
inputFields.description: An array of nicenames to include. Users matching one of these nicenames will be included in results.

inputFields.name: nicenameNotIn
inputFields.description: An array of nicenames to exclude. Users matching one of these nicenames will not be included in results.

inputFields.name: orderby
inputFields.description: What paramater to use to order the objects by.

inputFields.name: role
inputFields.description: An array of role names that users must match to be included in results. Note that this is an inclusive list: users must match *each* role.

inputFields.name: roleIn
inputFields.description: An array of role names. Matched users must have at least one of these roles.

inputFields.name: roleNotIn
inputFields.description: An array of role names to exclude. Users matching one or more of these roles will not be included in results.

inputFields.name: search
inputFields.description: Search keyword. Searches for possible string matches on columns. When "searchColumns" is left empty, it tries to determine which column to search in based on search string.

inputFields.name: searchColumns
inputFields.description: Array of column names to be searched. Accepts 'ID', 'login', 'nicename', 'email', 'url'.

types.name: UpdateCategoryInput
types.description: Input for the UpdateCategory mutation

inputFields.name: aliasOf
inputFields.description: The slug that the category will be an alias of

inputFields.name: description
inputFields.description: The description of the category object

inputFields.name: id
inputFields.description: The ID of the category object to update

inputFields.name: name
inputFields.description: The name of the category object to mutate

inputFields.name: parentId
inputFields.description: The ID of the category that should be set as the parent

inputFields.name: slug
inputFields.description: If this argument exists then the slug will be checked to see if it is not an existing valid term. If that check succeeds (it is not a valid term), then it is added and the term id is given. If it fails, then a check is made to whether the taxonomy is hierarchical and the parent argument is not empty. If the second check succeeds, the term will be inserted and the term id will be given. If the slug argument is empty, then it will be calculated from the term name.

types.name: UpdateCategoryPayload
types.description: The payload for the UpdateCategory mutation

fields.name: category
fields.description: The created category

types.name: CollectionTagsInput
types.description: Set relationships between the collection to tags

inputFields.name: append
inputFields.description: If true, this will append the tag to existing related tags. If false, this will replace existing relationships. Default true.

types.name: CollectionTagsNodeInput
types.description: List of tags to connect the collection to. If an ID is set, it will be used to create the connection. If not, it will look for a slug. If neither are valid existing terms, and the site is configured to allow terms to be created during post mutations, a term will be created using the Name if it exists in the input, then fallback to the slug if it exists.

inputFields.name: description
inputFields.description: The description of the tag. This field is used to set a description of the tag if a new one is created during the mutation.

inputFields.name: id
inputFields.description: The ID of the tag. If present, this will be used to connect to the collection. If no existing tag exists with this ID, no connection will be made.

inputFields.name: name
inputFields.description: The name of the tag. This field is used to create a new term, if term creation is enabled in nested mutations, and if one does not already exist with the provided slug or ID or if a slug or ID is not provided. If no name is included and a term is created, the creation will fallback to the slug field.

inputFields.name: slug
inputFields.description: The slug of the tag. If no ID is present, this field will be used to make a connection. If no existing term exists with this slug, this field will be used as a fallback to the Name field when creating a new term to connect to, if term creation is enabled as a nested mutation.

types.name: CreateCollectionPayload
types.description: The payload for the createCollection mutation

types.name: CreateCommentInput
types.description: Input for the createComment mutation

inputFields.name: approved
inputFields.description: The approval status of the comment.

inputFields.name: author
inputFields.description: The name of the comment's author.

inputFields.name: authorEmail
inputFields.description: The email of the comment's author.

inputFields.name: authorUrl
inputFields.description: The url of the comment's author.

inputFields.name: commentOn
inputFields.description: The ID of the post object the comment belongs to.

inputFields.name: content
inputFields.description: Content of the comment.

inputFields.name: date
inputFields.description: The date of the object. Preferable to enter as year/month/day ( e.g. 01/31/2017 ) as it will rearrange date as fit if it is not specified. Incomplete dates may have unintended results for example, "2017" as the input will use current date with timestamp 20:17

inputFields.name: parent
inputFields.description: Parent comment of current comment.

inputFields.name: type
inputFields.description: Type of comment.

types.name: CreateCommentPayload
types.description: The payload for the createComment mutation

fields.name: comment
fields.description: The comment that was created

fields.name: success
fields.description: Whether the mutation succeeded. If the comment is not approved, the server will not return the comment to a non authenticated user, but a success message can be returned if the create succeeded, and the client can optimistically add the comment to the client cache

types.name: CreateEditionInput
types.description: Input for the createEdition mutation

inputFields.name: aliasOf
inputFields.description: The slug that the edition will be an alias of

inputFields.name: description
inputFields.description: The description of the edition object

inputFields.name: name
inputFields.description: The name of the edition object to mutate

inputFields.name: slug
inputFields.description: If this argument exists then the slug will be checked to see if it is not an existing valid term. If that check succeeds (it is not a valid term), then it is added and the term id is given. If it fails, then a check is made to whether the taxonomy is hierarchical and the parent argument is not empty. If the second check succeeds, the term will be inserted and the term id will be given. If the slug argument is empty, then it will be calculated from the term name.

types.name: CreateEditionPayload
types.description: The payload for the createEdition mutation

fields.name: edition
fields.description: The created edition

types.name: CreatePostFormatInput
types.description: Input for the createPostFormat mutation

inputFields.name: aliasOf
inputFields.description: The slug that the post_format will be an alias of

inputFields.name: description
inputFields.description: The description of the post_format object

inputFields.name: name
inputFields.description: The name of the post_format object to mutate

inputFields.name: slug
inputFields.description: If this argument exists then the slug will be checked to see if it is not an existing valid term. If that check succeeds (it is not a valid term), then it is added and the term id is given. If it fails, then a check is made to whether the taxonomy is hierarchical and the parent argument is not empty. If the second check succeeds, the term will be inserted and the term id will be given. If the slug argument is empty, then it will be calculated from the term name.

types.name: Theme
types.description: A theme object

fields.name: author
fields.description: Name of the theme author(s), could also be a company name. This field is equivalent to WP_Theme->get( "Author" ).

fields.name: authorUri
fields.description: URI for the author/company website. This field is equivalent to WP_Theme->get( "AuthorURI" ).

fields.name: description
fields.description: The description of the theme. This field is equivalent to WP_Theme->get( "Description" ).

fields.name: id
fields.description: The globally unique identifier of the theme object.

fields.name: isRestricted
fields.description: Whether the object is restricted from the current viewer

fields.name: name
fields.description: Display name of the theme. This field is equivalent to WP_Theme->get( "Name" ).

fields.name: screenshot
fields.description: The URL of the screenshot for the theme. The screenshot is intended to give an overview of what the theme looks like. This field is equivalent to WP_Theme->get_screenshot().

fields.name: slug
fields.description: The theme slug is used to internally match themes. Theme slugs can have subdirectories like: my-theme/sub-theme. This field is equivalent to WP_Theme->get_stylesheet().

fields.name: tags
fields.description: URI for the author/company website. This field is equivalent to WP_Theme->get( "Tags" ).

fields.name: themeUri
fields.description: A URI if the theme has a website associated with it. The Theme URI is handy for directing users to a theme site for support etc. This field is equivalent to WP_Theme->get( "ThemeURI" ).

fields.name: version
fields.description: The current version of the theme. This field is equivalent to WP_Theme->get( "Version" ).

types.name: RootQueryToTermNodeConnectionWhereArgs
types.description: Arguments for filtering the RootQueryToTermNodeConnection connection

inputFields.name: cacheDomain
inputFields.description: Unique cache key to be produced when this query is stored in an object cache. Default is 'core'.

inputFields.name: childOf
inputFields.description: Term ID to retrieve child terms of. If multiple taxonomies are passed, $child_of is ignored. Default 0.

inputFields.name: childless
inputFields.description: True to limit results to terms that have no children. This parameter has no effect on non-hierarchical taxonomies. Default false.

inputFields.name: descriptionLike
inputFields.description: Retrieve terms where the description is LIKE the input value. Default empty.

inputFields.name: exclude
inputFields.description: Array of term ids to exclude. If $include is non-empty, $exclude is ignored. Default empty array.

inputFields.name: excludeTree
inputFields.description: Array of term ids to exclude along with all of their descendant terms. If $include is non-empty, $exclude_tree is ignored. Default empty array.

inputFields.name: hideEmpty
inputFields.description: Whether to hide terms not assigned to any posts. Accepts true or false. Default false

inputFields.name: hierarchical
inputFields.description: Whether to include terms that have non-empty descendants (even if $hide_empty is set to true). Default true.

inputFields.name: include
inputFields.description: Array of term ids to include. Default empty array.

inputFields.name: name
inputFields.description: Array of names to return term(s) for. Default empty.

inputFields.name: nameLike
inputFields.description: Retrieve terms where the name is LIKE the input value. Default empty.

inputFields.name: objectIds
inputFields.description: Array of object IDs. Results will be limited to terms associated with these objects.

inputFields.name: orderby
inputFields.description: Field(s) to order terms by. Defaults to 'name'.

inputFields.name: padCounts
inputFields.description: Whether to pad the quantity of a term's children in the quantity of each term's "count" object variable. Default false.

inputFields.name: parent
inputFields.description: Parent term ID to retrieve direct-child terms of. Default empty.

inputFields.name: search
inputFields.description: Search criteria to match terms. Will be SQL-formatted with wildcards before and after. Default empty.

inputFields.name: slug
inputFields.description: Array of slugs to return term(s) for. Default empty.

inputFields.name: taxonomies
inputFields.description: The Taxonomy to filter terms by

inputFields.name: termTaxonomId
inputFields.description: Array of term taxonomy IDs, to match when querying terms.

inputFields.name: updateTermMetaCache
inputFields.description: Whether to prime meta caches for matched terms. Default true.
